participant_1.background:
I have trouble finding shoes that fit my big, six-toed foot.
I miss playing outside with my friends in the summer.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
I practice martial arts regularly to stay in shape and defend myself.
i have a younger sibling.

participant_2.background:
I value my privacy most of all.
i am a professional skittles player.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i can speak four languages fluently.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! And you?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a basketball game.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I love basketball.
Me too! I play on a team in my city.
That's awesome! I used to play basketball when I was younger, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
Oh, that's too bad. Asthma can be tough.
Yeah, it can be. But I'm still active, I practice martial arts regularly.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn martial arts.
It's a lot of fun! I've been practicing for a few years now, and I've really gotten into it.
I'm sure I would too. I love learning new things.
Me too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play basketball, listen to music, and spend time with my family and friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! I like to play basketball, martial arts, and spend time with my family and friends too.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime and play basketball together.
I would love that! Let's exchange numbers and we'll set something up.
